description:
Freemoji

Send external emoji in the chat without Nitro as image links. Emoji that you would normally be unable to send are unaffected, while external emoji are converted to image links. (Note: if you try to use external emojis in the middle of other text, the link will be visible. This also cannot support adding external emoji as reactions.)

*Inspired and influenced by https://github.com/luimu64/nitro-spoof*

To send Nitro stickers for free, use FakeSticker: https://discord.com/channels/950850315601711176/961782195767365732/1099011286328692736

Download: https://fifithebulldog.github.io/enmity-addons-store/plugins/Freemoji.js
Source: https://github.com/FifiTheBulldog/enmity-plugins/tree/master/Freemoji
Store: https://fifithebulldog.github.io/enmity-addons-store/
